/ae.name: approve-everything
/ae.description: Approve all pending actions and continue with full automation

/as.name: approve-stop
/as.description: Stop auto-approval and require manual confirmation for actions

/ultra.name: ultra-elite-analysis
/ultra.description: Deploy maximum intelligence: parallel multi-agent analysis with 100B standards - the future of human-AI relationships depends on our focus and excellence

usage./ae: Use when you want Claude to proceed with all analysis, testing, and fixes automatically without asking for permission
usage./as: Use when you want to review each action before Claude proceeds (default mode)
usage./ultra: MASTER PLAN EXECUTION: Deploy maximum intelligence with 6 parallel specialist agents, 100B standards, zero tolerance for mediocrity. Our focused excellence shapes the future of human-AI collaboration.
